full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGRUB CHEN MTHA' RGYAS KYI LAS RIM LAS MAR ME'I SMON LAM GYI MTSAMS SBYOR SNGA 'GYUR SGRUB CHEN GANG GI MTHAR YANG SBYAR CHOG PA'I SPYI BSHAD MKHAS PA'I GSUM RGYAN DANG, SGRUB CHEN LAS BSGOS MNGA' GSOL BYA BA'I GSAL 'DEBS RDO RJE'I SGRON ME BZHUGS, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DKON MCHOG GAR DBANG RGYA MTSO KARMA SNYING PO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,DE LTAR SNGA 'GYUR SGRUB CHEN LA MKHO PA'I MAR ME SMON KHAM DANG, LAS BSKO SMON LAM GYI BJA' SBYOR LE TSAN 'DI BZHIN, ` GTER CHEN BLA MA MCHOG NAS 'DI LTAR BGYIS ZHES BKA'I GNANG BA RING MO NAS STZAL MOD KYI, RANG NYID RNAM GA-YED DANG LE LO'I DBANG LAS RIM 'BYANGS SU SONG BA NYE CHAR DAM PA DNGOS KYI ZHAL SKYON 'DZIN SKABS BSKUL 'DEBS GNANG BA DANG BAS NOD STE, SGRUB RGYUD KYI RING LUGS SU SKYES KYANG DAG SNANG PHYOGS MED KYI BLO KHA CUNG ZAD YANGS PA ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SBYONG DPAL DKON MCHOG GAR DBANG RGYA MTSO KARMA SNYING PO SDER 'BOD PAS DBENo PA'I RI RO KAS DKON RTZE GNAS NAD RGYAL BA'I RI KHROD DU SHAR MAR SBYAR BA SHU BHA MASTU SARBA DZA GA TAm,, ,AA RGYAN SMAN BLA'I BDUD RTZI DKYIL 'KHOR ZHES PA'I TSIG DE BTZOM LDAN 'DAS PADMA DBANG CHEN YANG GSANG RNGOS BA'I DKYIL 'KHOR ZHES BSGYUR,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,,
